summary: Diff implements substantial UI colorfulness and gradient/tinted-surface enhancements across multiple storefront and portal pages, and adds shared status styling with a reusable OrderStatusBadge. However, the requested regenerated image assets are not evidenced in the diff summary, and the palette appears to be expanded beyond the stated primary/secondary/accent set via new chart colors.

missing_requirements.requirement: Regenerate/replace the specified marketing and UI image assets with more saturated/colorful versions (hero banners 1-3, category icon sprite, trust badges).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only shows code changes referencing new '-colorful' hero banner paths, but does not show any added/modified files under frontend/public/assets/generated for the requested PNG outputs (including category-icons-sprite-colorful and trust-badges-set-colorful).

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded the theme palette beyond the stated primary (orange/yellow), secondary (blue), and accent (green) by adding additional chart colors (e.g., chart-4, chart-5 with hues not clearly within the defined palette).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constrains work to the already-defined palette; adding extra chart tokens appears to introduce additional colors not requested.
